Name: Name
Definition: Column headers from each csv file in the dataset.

Name: Unit
Definition: Units that apply to a given column in the dataset.

Name: Definition
Definition: Description of the information in a given column in the dataset.

Name: Type
Definition: Type of term (column header; row header; data flag).

Name: Data_Type
Definition: Type of data (text; numeric; date).

Name: File_Name
Definition: Name of the files in the dataset/data package.

Name: File_Description
Definition: A brief description of the files in the dataset/data package.

Name: Standard
Definition: Standard applied to the data file.

Name: Start_Date
Definition: The earliest date in the file.

Name: End_Date
Definition: The latest date in the file.

Name: Latitude
Definition: Latitude of sensor measurement.

Name: Longitude
Definition: Longitude of sensor measurement.

Name: InstallationMethod_ID
Definition: Unique user-determined ID for a method described in the InstallationMethods_Description column in InstallationMethods.csv and listed as a metadata header row term in the data file(s).

Name: InstallationMethod_Description
Definition: Free text field to describe the sensor installation/deployment design, structure, or general information.

Name: Site_ID
Definition: Unique Location_ID identifier for a particular site within the Watershed Function SFA field site

Name: Depth
Definition: Depth at which the sensor is deployed.

Name: Elevation
Definition: Elevation at which the sensor is deployed.

Name: Site_Name
Definition: Site name of location where the data is from.

Name: Site_Type
Definition: Water body type or local environmental context in which sensor was deployed. The field uses the ENVO controlled vocabulary https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/envo).

Name: Configuration
Definition: Description of sensor installation/deployment configuration. The field uses the following controlled vocabulary: Well; Piezometer; Open water column; Buried in sediment or soil; Surface of sediment or soil; Engineered flow-through structure.

Name: DateTime_Start
Definition: Start date and time of an InstallationMethod_ID. YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

Name: DateTime_End
Definition: End date and time of an InstallationMethod_ID. YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.

Name: UTC_Offset
Definition: UTC offset of date/timestamp.

Name: HeaderRows_*
Definition: The number of header rows in a given data file(s). In each file, the number of header rows replaces the asterisk.

Name: Instrument_Summary
Definition: Free text field providing general information about the instrumentation used for a given column of data (e.g. make and model of sensor).

Name: DateTime
Definition: Date and time of waterlevel measurement.

Name: Date
Definition: Date of waterlevel measurement.

Name: Waterlevel_5min
Definition: Measurement of waterlevel for 5 minute frequency. Waterlevel measured with In-Situ Aqua TROLL 200 Data Logger sensor.

Name: Waterlevel_1hr
Definition: Measurement of waterlevel for 1 hour frequency. Waterlevel measured with In-Situ Aqua TROLL 200 Data Logger sensor.

Name: Waterlevel_1d
Definition: Measurement of waterlevel for daily frequency. Waterlevel measured with In-Situ Aqua TROLL 200 Data Logger sensor.

Name: Waterlevel_5min_trend
Definition: Temporal trend of 5 minute interval with removed high-frequency data.

Name: Waterlevel_1hr_trend
Definition: Temporal trend of 1 hour interval with removed high-frequency data.

Name: Waterlevel_1d_trend
Definition: Temporal trend of daily interval with removed high-frequency data.

Name: dupl_time
Definition: Data flag for duplicated date within data file.

Name: flag_na_Date
Definition: Data flag for missing date within data file.

Name: flag_na_WL
Definition: Data flag for missing waterlevel within data file.

Name: flag_outl_WL
Definition: Data flag for outlier waterlevel measurements.
